feat.value: In the beginning, Abba Evagrius/Euprepius went to an old man and said to him,
'Speak to me, how shall I be saved?'
'If you wish to be saved, do not be disdainful.
And if you should visit someone,
at first do not speak, until he questions you.'
And he [Evagrius/Euprepius] was pricked by this word,
and he bowed before him [the old man], saying,
Truly, I have read a multitude of books,
but I have never learned wisdom.'
And he benefited and he went away.
